name: Honour Runs
description:
• Honour Runs is a visceral, retro inspired, twin stick, score challenge shooter where you progress by cleaning out a series of 15 hand crafted, increasingly complex and challenging dungeons.
  • There are keys and hidden switches leading to power ups and to operate teleports and barriers to progress.
  • Unlocked frame rate and resolutions.
  • Original sound track.



  • A complex scoring system lets you refine your style on repeated plays to balance all of the score factors and compete on global leaderboards.
  • Battle against overwhelming odds, face mini bosses and use your pick ups and power ups with care.



  • Unlock the Remixes once you've completed all 15 dungeons and compete with much greater difficulty on the Remix leaderboards.
